comments:
I got the java.util.ConcurrentModificationException below when editing code.

I was editing a unit test TestCase subclass. I commented out the last method in
the file. In the method above that one, I when to the last line in the method,
hit <Enter> and typed "assertF" and ctrl-space. Around that time, a dialog poped
up telling me to look at the log for an error. I got the following in the console:

ok
